summary:
Come one, come all! Port Telgarth, a majestic middle-sized city (as big as Skyrim\'s cities) lost in the
sea of ghosts, just opened its doors to Skyrim\'s visitors. Take the boat from Dawnstar and explore the town!
descriptionHtml:
Project: [u] Port Telgarth [/u]
Author: Lord Dagobert
Version: 1.0
Release Date: 7/08/2013
Category: New Lands

[img]http://lorddagobert.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/wp-content/uploads/t1.jpg [/img]
============================================================================================
[b]Come one, come all!  [/b] Port Telgarth, a majestic middle-sized city (as big as Skyrim\'s cities) lost in the sea of ghosts, just opened its doors to Skyrim\'s visitors. Take the boat from Dawnstar and explore the town! (check the image if you cannot find the boat)

============================================================================================
Visit it\'s markets, drink in the local inn, or even pray at Talos\' Temple. The choice is yours![b] You can even own a house and a horse!! [/b]

[b]However [/b], do not commit any crime in the Port.
The town watch, associated with Eastmarch, will make you pay for any crime you commit against the citizens of Port Telgarth.

[img]http://lorddagobert.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/wp-content/uploads/182.jpg [/img]
============================================================================================
Find a new armor set by exploring the city, find a new sword, create new poisons, end the corruption in the Port, and use a deadly disease against your enemies! 
Port Telgarth hides many secrets. It is your turn to discover them!

With over 250 hours of work on the Creation kit, Port Telgarth is my first Skyrim City. Enjoy!

============================================================================================
Points of Interest in Port Telgarth:
The Markets
A smith
The Inn
Telgarth Keep
Telgarth Census & Excise, where you can obtain 2 houses
A General Store
The house of pleasures
The Temple of Talos
A fence & a Skooma dealer
The Hall of the Dead
The Warehouse
& Much more!

[img] http://lorddagobert.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/wp-content/uploads/39.jpg  [/img]
author: Lord Dagobert
